# OpenCode Base16 Themes

**Link:** https://github.com/scaryrawr/base16-opencode

**Summary:** A collection of base16 and base24 themes for OpenCode, auto-generated and always up to date with the latest theme specifications. Features include:

- Complete base16 theme collection
- Auto-generated theme updates
- Base24 theme support
- Consistent color scheme application
- Easy installation with single clone command
- Community-maintained theme repository

This repository provides OpenCode users with a comprehensive collection of standardized color themes, ensuring consistency across different tools and applications that support the base16 theme specification.
